critique: The document discusses amending a schedule to include certain positions in the competitive classified service. The tone is formal and administrative. The primary emotion the President wants to elicit is a sense of fairness and order. There is no explicit mention of emotions, so I will infer them based on the context. Joy might be present in a small amount due to the idea of fair governance. Sadness, anger, fear, and disgust are unlikely to be present. Surprise might be present in a small amount due to the change in policy.
